languages.text: Лорд-капитану известно, что вход в укрытие монахов находится возле циркулярного когитатора и открывается специальной молитвой
The Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the priests' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a special prayer.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитану известно, что вход в укрытие монахов находится возле циркулярного когитатора и открывается специальной молитвой

traits.locale_text: Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the monks' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a decryptor prayer.
The Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the monks' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a special prayer.
The Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the monks' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a special prayer.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain weiß, dass sich der Eingang zum Versteck der Priester in der Nähe des Zirkularcogitators befindet und mit einem speziellen Gebet geöffnet werden kann.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the priests' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a special prayer.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain weiß, dass der Eingang zum Versteck der Mönche sich in der Nähe des kreisförmigen Cogitators befindet und mit einem speziellen Gebet geöffnet werden kann.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} sait que l'entrée de la cachette des prêtres se situe près du cogitateur circulaire et qu'une prière spéciale peut l'ouvrir.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the priests' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a special prayer.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} sait que l'entrée de la cachette des moines se situe près du cogitateur circulaire et qu'une prière spéciale peut l'ouvrir.

languages.text: 领主舰长已经知晓，神甫藏身之处的入口就位于环形沉思者附近，可以通过某种特殊的祈祷打开。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the priests' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a special prayer.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长已经知晓，僧侣藏身之处的入口就位于环形思考器附近，可以通过某种特殊的祈祷打开。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、司祭たちの隠れ家への入り口が円形の考算機の近くにあり、特別な祈りによって開くことができると知っていた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the priests' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a special prayer.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、司祭たちの隠れ家への入り口が円形の考算機の近くにあり、特別な祈りによって開くことができると知っていた。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán sabe que la entrada al escondite de los sacerdotes está situada cerca del cogitador circular y se abre con una plegaria especial.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the priests' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a special prayer.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán sabe que la entrada al escondite de los monjes está situada cerca del cogitador circular y se abre con una plegaria especial.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, rahiplerin saklandığı yerin girişinin dairesel kavramsayarın yakınlarında bulunduğunu ve özel bir tür dua ile açıldığını öğrendi.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain knows that the entrance to the priests' hiding place is located near the circular cogitator and can be opened by a special prayer.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, rahiplerin saklandığı yerin girişinin dairesel kavramsayarın yakınlarında bulunduğunu ve özel bir tür dua ile açıldığını öğrendi.
